oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A letter from Herbert Solomon Garner to W.O. Garner about the dedication of the Great Smokey Mountains National Park
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Garner, Herbert Solomon
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Correspondence; Garner, Herbert Solomon; Garner, William Orland; Maryville (Tenn.); Pomona (Calif.); Transcript
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: A letter by Herbert Solomon Garner to W.O. Garner asking if they will come and visit Tennessee during the summer and mentioning that President Roosevelt is supposed to dedicate the Great Smokey Mountains National Park in June.
